item.description: @toddsieling There‚Äôs a desktop mode, easily accessible, which seems pretty open, i.e. you can install software by downloading it from a browser. I didn‚Äôt do any unlocking or rooting to install itch.‚Äãio games, for example. I just had to install the Linux desktop client and login.
item.source:markdown: @toddsieling There‚Äôs a desktop mode, easily accessible, which seems pretty open, i.e. you can install software by downloading it from a browser. I didn‚Äôt do any unlocking or rooting to install itch.‚Äãio games, for example. I just had to install the Linux desktop client and login.

item.description: @toddsieling ü§î I just found a less fiddly way to install Epic Games Store games, so maybe I‚Äôll try that again. I installed the https://t.co/QLPPDNTSSB launcher almost right after unboxing, though.
item.source:markdown: @toddsieling ü§î I just found a less fiddly way to install Epic Games Store games, so maybe I‚Äôll try that again. I installed the https://t.co/QLPPDNTSSB launcher almost right after unboxing, though.

item.description: @toddsieling I do. I like it, but I don‚Äôt see myself using it for anything other than small games, or soothing exploration games. There‚Äôs one game that I‚Äôd play a lot on it if it were still on Steam. I could install it if I fiddle a bunch, but would rather not do that.
item.source:markdown: @toddsieling I do. I like it, but I don‚Äôt see myself using it for anything other than small games, or soothing exploration games. There‚Äôs one game that I‚Äôd play a lot on it if it were still on Steam. I could install it if I fiddle a bunch, but would rather not do that.

item.description:
I don‚Äôt want to alarm you, but I think I‚Äôve settled on a clothing style where I both look good and feel comfortable.

It‚Äôll make my dad so happy to learn that, just like him, I‚Äôm going to be well stocked in collared shirts.
item.source:markdown:
I don‚Äôt want to alarm you, but I think I‚Äôve settled on a clothing style where I both look good and feel comfortable.
It‚Äôll make my dad so happy to learn that, just like him, I‚Äôm going to be well stocked in collared shirts.

item.description: @anguspratt I have a cleaning service, since I don‚Äôt want to clean any of the surfaces in my place, though I only ever have them come in a day before I leave on an trip, so I can come back to a clean apartment. It‚Äôs all the other stuff like cooking and laundry that‚Äôs dull and time-consuming.

item.description: First attempt at what I lovingly refer to as ‚ÄúMeal C‚Äù (after the letter it‚Äôs assigned at my favourite cha chaan teng, New Town Bakery in Vancouver), chicken chow mein. I may have slightly undercooked the chicken (not brown enough). The carrots and bok choy were nice additions. https://t.co/8ulhTSpsp0

item.description:
A dude remarked remarked on my DJ Shadow shirt at the grocery store just now. We had a conversation about it.

It‚Äôs only ever been dudes. I‚Äôd wonder if there were any women DJ Shadow fans if I didn‚Äôt know the reason why women don‚Äôt remark on what I wear.
item.source:markdown:
